fixes.name: Risk Date # of Days
fixes.solution_explanation: Recreated the Tableau calculated field [Risk Date # of Days] as a row-level calculated column by subtracting the two datetime columns on the same table.

fixes.name: Bull Flattener Large Shock
fixes.dax_expression:
VAR days = 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Risk Date # of Days]
RETURN
IF(
    days < 750,
    -5,
    IF(
        days > 10950,
        -10,
        -5 * (1 - (days - 750) / (10950 - 750)) + -10 * (days - 750) / (10950 - 750)
    )
)
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted the Tableau IF/ELSE logic to DAX using a VAR for the row-level [Risk Date # of Days] and nested IFs; created as a calculated column because it operates at the row level without aggregation.
